Flicker::

Meanwhile, the spy-bot watches Conder in the CR.  He'd be coming out 
soon, which worries Flicker.  He needed to get his target quickly.  
Palming the neural disruptor again, he heads to Rodimus and 
Nightlight's quarters and knocks on the door.
